azurerm_sql_active_directory_administrat.description: Manages an Active Directory administrator on a SQL server

server_name.description: The name of the SQL Server on which to set the administrator. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group for the SQL server. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

login.description: The login name of the principal to set as the server administrator

object_id.description: The ID of the principal to set as the server administrator

id.description: The ID of the SQL Active Directory Administrator.

create.description: Used when creating the SQL Active Directory Administrator.

update.description: Used when updating the SQL Active Directory Administrator.

read.description: Used when retrieving the SQL Active Directory Administrator.

delete.description: Used when deleting the SQL Active Directory Administrator.
